[DQC.US.0118.9575] The statement 100040 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations and Comprehensive Income (Loss) includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLoss of 9,180,000 in the default should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -4,992,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts. If a value is not available then the values associated with the members of the dimension are used to complete the calculation. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-07-01 to 2021-06-30 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLoss that should add to 9,180,000 are comprised of the following:
+ GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment -2,336,000 - GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment 1,081,000 + GrossProfit 75,351,000 - SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense 72,505,000 + GainLossRemeasurementOfContingentConsiderationLiabilities 329,000 + GainOnLitigationProceeds -4,750,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 100040 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations and Comprehensive Income (Loss). If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will add dimension components as well, so if the calculation is correct and the breakdown is a dimension, then check to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly. Values calculated by adding a dimension member are shown in the calculation.
Total Element : us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLoss Total Value : 9,180,000 Total period : 2020-07-01 to 2021-06-30 Dimensions : Rule Element Id:9575 Rule version: 16.0.3 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1834045/000095017021002112/vwe-20210630.htm 9647

[DQC.US.0118.9575] The statement 100040 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations and Comprehensive Income (Loss) includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept us-gaap:NetIncomeLoss of 9,870,000 in the default should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 10,306,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts. If a value is not available then the values associated with the members of the dimension are used to complete the calculation. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-07-01 to 2021-06-30 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of us-gaap:NetIncomeLoss that should add to 9,870,000 are comprised of the following:
- NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest -218,000 + ProfitLoss 10,088,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 100040 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations and Comprehensive Income (Loss). If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will add dimension components as well, so if the calculation is correct and the breakdown is a dimension, then check to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly. Values calculated by adding a dimension member are shown in the calculation.
Total Element : us-gaap:NetIncomeLoss Total Value : 9,870,000 Total period : 2020-07-01 to 2021-06-30 Dimensions : Rule Element Id:9575 Rule version: 16.0.3 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1834045/000095017021002112/vwe-20210630.htm 3521

[DQC.US.0118.9575] The statement 100040 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations and Comprehensive Income (Loss) includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept us-gaap:ProfitLoss of 10,088,000 in the default should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 11,620,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts. If a value is not available then the values associated with the members of the dimension are used to complete the calculation. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-07-01 to 2021-06-30 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of us-gaap:ProfitLoss that should add to 10,088,000 are comprised of the following:
+ IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesExtraordinaryItemsNoncontrollingInterest 10,854,000 - IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit -766,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 100040 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations and Comprehensive Income (Loss). If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will add dimension components as well, so if the calculation is correct and the breakdown is a dimension, then check to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly. Values calculated by adding a dimension member are shown in the calculation.
